member.name: D2D1_EDGEDETECTION_MODE
member.summary: Values for the property of the Edge Detection effect.

member.name: D2D1_EDGEDETECTION_MODE.D2D1_EDGEDETECTION_MODE_SOBEL
member.summary: Indicates the Sobel operator should be used for edge detection.

member.name: D2D1_EDGEDETECTION_MODE.D2D1_EDGEDETECTION_MODE_PREWITT
member.summary: Indicates the Prewitt operator should be used for edge detection.
